类的使用
org.springframework.boot.logging.LoggingSystem

  • 使用LoggingSystem的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.boot.logging
    Support and abstractions across several logging libraries.
    org.springframework.boot.logging.java
    Support for 'Java Util Logging'.
    org.springframework.boot.logging.log4j2
    Support for the Log4j 2 logging library.
    org.springframework.boot.logging.logback
    Support for the Logback logging library.

    • org.springframework.boot.logging中LoggingSystem的使用

      org.springframework.boot.logging中LoggingSystem的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AbstractLoggingSystem
      Abstract base class for LoggingSystem implementations.
      class  Slf4JLoggingSystem
      Abstract base class for LoggingSystem implementations that utilize SLF4J.
      返回LoggingSystem的org.springframework.boot.logging中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static LoggingSystem LoggingSystem.get(ClassLoader classLoader)
      Detect and return the logging system in use.
      参数类型为LoggingSystem的org.springframework.boot.logging中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected void LoggingApplicationListener.initializeLogLevel(LoggingSystem system, LogLevel level) 
      protected void LoggingApplicationListener.setLogLevels(LoggingSystem system, org.springframework.core.env.Environment environment) 

    • org.springframework.boot.logging.java中LoggingSystem的使用

      org.springframework.boot.logging.java中LoggingSystem的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  JavaLoggingSystem
      LoggingSystem for java.util.logging.
